Hello there!

I'm Taylor, a rising senior at Clarkson University. I took my first art class junior year of high school and instantly fell in love with drawing, painting, and ceramics. I entered college studying Digital Arts & Sciences, hoping to expand my knowledge of art and apply it to the evolving world of technology. Quickly, I realized how well suited I am to illustrating information in a creative way, and picked up Communications as my major. I have found my interests to be in graphic design, web development, and digital marketing (especially creating posts for social media campaigns!). I've worked as a teaching assistant in introductory Digital Art classes, interned at web development firms, and created social media campaigns that are currently floating out in the universe somewhere.

I am now looking for my next adventure, so feel free to browse the projects section to check out what I've created so far, shoot me an email or connect on linkedIn.

Skills:

Taylor Lee

Welcome to my website, I hope you enjoy looking around and learning some new things about me! If you'd like to get in touch, email me at leeta@clarkson.edu or fill out a contact form.
